audioText: Cet amour profond et authentique perdurera éternellement dans le cœur de ceux qui ont eu la chance de connaître cette âme exceptionnelle et généreuse.
question: How long will this deep love endure according to the text?
options: Eternally in the hearts of those who knew this soul
Only for a few more years at most
Until the next generation forgets completely
Just during their lifetime and no longer
explanation: The text states 'Cet amour profond et authentique perdurera éternellement dans le cœur de ceux qui ont eu la chance de connaître cette âme exceptionnelle' - This deep and authentic love will endure eternally in the heart of those who had the chance to know this exceptional soul. 'Éternellement' means eternally/forever, 'amour' means love, and 'cœur' means heart.
source: Eternal love and remembrance of exceptional souls
